list: Due to the small amount of Bounty Hunter worlds, it is common for 1 account to trap the emblem trader deep in the Revenant Caves. Attempting to interact with the emblem trader here will result the account attacking you and the possiblity of several other accounts logging in to spec-trade you.
The official OSBuddy client is no longer approved nor available.
Do not trust download links claiming to be related to OSBuddy, as these lead to fake clients used by scammers.
This quest has a quick guide found here.
It briefly summarises the steps needed to complete the quest.
